question: the recipient of first jnanpith award was an author which language
api_result: The recipient of the first Jnanpith Award was G. Sankara Kurup, an author who wrote in Malayalam. He received the award in 1965 for his work "Odakkuzhal" (The Bamboo Flute, 1950). The Jnanpith Award is one of the highest literary honors in India and is given for outstanding contribution to literature in any of the major languages of India.
